程序包 com.shapeville.game

类 SectorCalculation.Sector

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.game.SectorCalculation.Sector
封闭类:
SectorCalculation
public static class SectorCalculation.Sector extends Object
Inner class representing a sector with its properties and rendering capabilities. Each sector contains radius, angle, unit of measurement, and calculation results.

    • Sector

      public Sector(double radius, double angle, String unit)
      Constructs a new Sector with the specified parameters.
      参数:
      radius - The radius of the sector
      angle - The angle of the sector in degrees
      unit - The unit of measurement (e.g., cm, m, ft)

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d, int width, int height)
      Draws the sector on the specified graphics context.
      参数:
      g2d - The graphics context to draw on
      width - The width of the drawing area
      height - The height of the drawing area
